Subject: [junit] Assert as a keyword in JDK1.4 Beta 2
Importance: High



Hi !,
 
    In JDK 1.4.0 Beta 2 verion, assert is a keyword. Has any one looked into
this ? Is there any proposed changes for the JUnit assert method ? How will
a code for the unit testing written using JUnit be compatible with the
JDK1.4 version ? 
 
 
-ASM
